segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is spilling out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or if she’s really that oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at them to be careful, but it’s not my place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
